data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kampala, Uganda so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kampala, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Kampala to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 52 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kampala, Uganda.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Kampala, Uganda to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 458,344 believers in the state of Kampala with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Aringa people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, please give the 458,344 believers in the state of Kampala the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Kampala. Through your servants plant 276 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kampala, Uganda has a population of 1,382,700.

We estimate Kampala has 458,344 people who might know Jesus, 690,482 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 233,874 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kampala a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
